entities

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    A course object defines a course by its m_name, the used submission system, the location of the course documents, the folder structure in the submission system, as well as the Authentication information for the specific submission system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Course(int id, java.lang.String name)
      Create a new course object by passed name, and id.
      Course(int id, java.lang.String name, int startExerciseIdAt)
      Create a new course object by passed m_name, m_id and the number at which exercise ids will start.

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the course
        name - Name of the course.
        startExerciseIdAt - the index where the IDs of exercises will start

        public Exercise getExercise(int id)
        Gets a exercise for a given m_name. Returns null if exercise does not exist.
        Parameters:
        id - the m_name of the wanted exercise
        Returns:
        copy of the stored Exercise on success, null otherwise

      • addExercise

        public Exercise addExercise(int connectionId,
                   ExerciseMetadata metadata)
                     throws WrongDateException
        Adds a new exercise and starts it.
        Parameters:
        connectionId - the id of the connection for the exercise
        metadata - the meta data for the exercise
        Returns:
        the Exercise on success, null otherwise
        Throws:
        WrongDateException - if the deadline is before the start time

      • updateExercise

        public Exercise updateExercise(int exerciseId,
                      int connectionId,
                      ExerciseMetadata metadata)
                        throws WrongDateException
        Updates an exercise with new meta data.
        Parameters:
        exerciseId - the id of the exercise to be updated
        connectionId - the id of the connection to be used by the updated exercise
        metadata - the meta data for the updated exercise
        Returns:
        the updated exercise
        Throws:
        WrongDateException - if the deadline is before the start time

        Parameters:

      • stopAllExercises

        public void stopAllExercises()
        Stops all exerices of a course. The exerices are not deleted.
